DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , blind clinical trial compare overnight laminaria versus same-day Dilapan cervical preparation surgical abortion occur fourteen eighteen week gestation . Comparisons make procedure time , need additional dilation , occurrence complication , patient provider satisfaction . Hypothesis : Cervical preparation surgical abortion , fourteen eighteen week gestation , same-day Dilapan non-inferior cervical preparation overnight laminaria within five-minute difference . Primary objective : Determine differences procedure time Secondary objective : Examine complication , need additional dilation early second-trimester surgical abortion perform cervical preparation same-day Dilapan versus perform cervical preparation overnight laminaria
DOC.criteria: Pregnancy fourteen eighteen week gestation Request elective abortion certainty decision proceed Incarceration Minor status ( woman young eighteen year ) Allergy Dilapan laminaria Inability speak understand Spanish English
